https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/A9t5QtGXzMtJpAzfcweu39oWCgl.jpg Set in an area between the Yugoslavia and Albanian border in the year 1968, an idealist teacher wants to cross the border to Albania, where he believes he will find a state of ideal communism. Donkeys of the Border
